body:
Interestingly it seems as though `String#==` is constant time on MRI 1.8.7 & 1.9.3:

``` ruby
require 'benchmark/ips'

GC.disable

def secure_compare(a, b)
  a == b
end

val1 = '1f9a12d8cacb4db86e75148b442c96150a5211a9'
val2 = '1f9a12d8cacb4db86e75148b442c96150a5211a9'
val3 = '2f9a12d8cacb4db86e75148b442c96150a5211a9'

Benchmark.ips do |x|
  x.report("same") { secure_compare(val1, val2) }
  x.report("diff") { secure_compare(val1, val3) }
end
```
``` sh
$ ruby -r rubygems secure_compare.rb
Calculating -------------------------------------
                same     48360 i/100ms
                diff     46273 i/100ms
-------------------------------------------------
                same  1375196.9 (±6.6%) i/s -    6770400 in   5.013627s
                diff  1388258.8 (±7.3%) i/s -    6709585 in   5.022314s
```
